Method Detail

post_comments_id_comments

public JSONObject post_comments_id_comments(java.lang.String id,
                                            java.lang.String comment)
500px POST_comments_id_comments. Creates a reply to an existing comment. Comments can only be nested one level deep, you cannot reply to a reply of a comment. If a comment has a non-null parent_id value then it cannot be replied to.

Parameters:
id - (required) - id of a comment.
comment - (required) Ñ Content of the comment.
Returns:
JSON response. See 500px API for details.

Remark: Requires OAuth authentication.
